meanings.definition: Offensive to modesty or decency; lewd.
meanings.sent1: The indecent behavior of the man made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The movie was banned due to its indecent scenes.
meanings.sent3: The indecent joke at the party caused a few awkward laughs.
meanings.sent4: Her indecent language painted a vivid picture of her lack of manners.
meanings.sent5: The indecent graffiti on the wall was a shocking sight for the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Not conforming with generally accepted standards of behavior or propriety; morally offensive.
meanings.sent1: Wearing indecent clothing to a formal event is considered disrespectful.
meanings.sent2: The politician's indecent actions led to his downfall.
meanings.sent3: The indecent proposal was met with gasps of disbelief.
meanings.sent4: His indecent behavior towards his colleagues was like a dark cloud over the office.
meanings.sent5: The indecent display of wealth at the party was distasteful to many guests.
